Welcome to COS72 Community Tool

COS72 is a simple community tool that any product or business can use to build their own community with embedded common features. Through this platform, you can connect users, incentivize participation, and build loyalty.

Learn More
COS72

Key Features

üöÄ

Onboarding

Visible to new/non-logged users, get Gas Card after registration, claim SBT after having reputation

üí∞

OpenPNTs/OpenCards

Issue points and establish white cards, other communities with reputation can get point sponsorship

‚úÖ

Tasks

Contract interactions, complete tasks to earn points and reputation

üõí

Shops

Admins upload services and products, members exchange points for goods, services and coupons

üèÜ

Reputation Rank

Earn reputation by completing tasks, includes NFT and weighted points

üè†

Homepage

Points to single-page introduction, defaults to homepage, customizable background image

How to Use

  1. Clone and initialize configuration
  2. One-click deployment to web (GitHub Pages, Netlify, or others)
  3. Create community and start using
  4. Set up community basic information and contracts through admin interface
  5. Invite users to join and start interacting
